description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for the Manager Feedback Center screen in a mobile app. It includes UI elements such as an app bar, header, and list of placeholder items, along with permission checks.

classes.name: ManagerFeedbackCenterScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders the Feedback Center screen for managers, including permission verification and UI layout.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget representing individual feedback list items with styling and icons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the ManagerFeedbackCenterScreen, handling authorization and layout.

methods.name: _Item.build
methods.description: Builds the UI component for a feedback list item with icon, text, and styled container.
